snippet.title: Little Red Lie (itch.io MFGJ 2021 Submission) Playthrough
snippet.description:
!!!!! IMPORTANT TEXT BELOW !!!!!


So yeah, for this new year one of my goals was getting into the gaming industry.
And it would be soon enough that I'd discover about game jams, and by incredible luck I'd instantly find a great team to work on game development with. Ralph, Pierce, Ivy, Neena and Claire were a blast to work with 4 real.
Little red lie is the game they came up with, during this 2 week time-limited for fun contest. And the result is preem & beautiful.
Ralph, Pierce and Ivy took care of the code, Neena and Claire did the art. And I (Rinkaku) did the soundtrack & sound design.


This playthrough is basically showcasing this experience we worked hard on, an horror-adventure 2D side scroll with puzzle elements. The video goes through one of the endings, but I didn't record the other one - leaving that for you to discover it yourself.


!!!!! IMPORTANT LINKS !!!!!


Game link : https://ralphyua.itch.io/little-red-lie

Ralph : https://www.kreatorbus.com/profilepage?profileId=5e549b3af930c92294344eb8
Pierce : https://github.com/thecodewarrior
Ivy : they are deleted.
Neena : https://www.artstation.com/ratqueenarts
Claire : https://clairemakerart.weebly.com/

OST available on Bandcamp : https://theflyoccultist.bandcamp.com/album/little-red-lie-original-game-soundtrack
